title: El almuerzo nudista
desc: Chaki loves weed. She always has some, smokes at every moment, jokes about it. It helps her endure the oppressive day-to-day of standing work. The other thing she loves is sex—she calls herself pansexual, open to everything and everyone. One night, after her shitty job, she comes home, sinks her sore feet into a tub of hot water, when the phone rings: a friend inviting her to a nudist lunch in the countryside. The day of the lunch is sunny and Chaki feels right at home. But when she steps aside to take a hit, events take an unexpected turn…"
